pageContext.claim: “You know what you call them, right? Suppression polls, right? Suppression. They give you phony polls so that you say, 'You know what darling? We have an election tonight. But Trump won't win because the polls are so bad. But let's go to a movie and then we'll come home and we'll watch his defeat.'”
pageContext.analysis: There is no evidence that pollsters deliberately manipulated their numbers in order to discourage Trump voters.
